author: Rick
post_text: June 16, 2016 at 6:13 PM#1Hi there,I have a cuelist with different color bumps in it (2part, 3part etc) i want to create a macro that can load the different colorbumps. but i can't find the right syntax to load these bumps. does anybody here knows the right syntax.thanks already!

posts.author: Rick
posts.post_text: June 16, 2016 at 6:13 PM#1Hi there,I have a cuelist with different color bumps in it (2part, 3part etc) i want to create a macro that can load the different colorbumps. but i can't find the right syntax to load these bumps. does anybody here knows the right syntax.thanks already!

posts.author: glad
posts.post_text: June 16, 2016 at 6:27 PM#2CodeLoad Cue x Executor ymake sure to use a Temp button, to activate the loaded cue, and set restart-option to 'Current Cue' to keep the loaded bump

title: Macro for Cue select
